title: Learning - Initiative

title: Learning - Initiative
section: 1. Identify and understand the Business Needs.
text:
1. Identify and understand the Business Needs.

a) Determine the long-term goal of the product (i.e., good or service) and write it down.
The long-term goal of mastering computing is to increase efficiency (through automation) and effectiveness of activities.


b) Answer the question “Why are we doing this project?”
The reason for mastering computing is to increase efficiency (through automation) and effectiveness of activities.


c) Identify the success criteria that will indicate whether or not the product (i.e., good or service) is successful.
If you master something, you learn how to do it properly or you succeed in understanding it completely.
Hence, mastering computing has been successful if we either learn how to do it properly or we succeed in understanding it completely.
